title: Kingemmanuel
author: Kingemmanuel
content: Be the first to build the first ever confidential dApp in Solidity, and win prizes. Sapphire, the Confidential EVM ParaTime, allows you to use familiar tools to build confidential smart contracts and dApps.Today is the final to join the Keep It Confidential Hackathon! Please submit your applications ASAP. If you have any questions or need assistance, we are happy to help in the #ðŸ’»â”ƒhackathon channel on Discord. https://oasisprotocol.org/hackathon
